level.heading: Maintenance of documents.
level.text: Copies of the specimen Bonds and of the final Financing Documents and Closing Documents shall be filed in the Office of the Secretary of the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 12 of Howard Theatre Redevelopment project Great Streets Initiative Tax Increment Financing Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-516, August 3, 2010, 57 DCR 7971).

For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 12 of Howard Theatre Redevelopment Project Great Streets Initiative Tax Increment Financing Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-573, October 19, 2010, 57 DCR 10090).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-275, see notes under ยง 2-1217.34a.
